scripts.install: concurrently -n Intel,Payload,Common "cd Intel && npm i" "cd Payload && npm i" "cd Common && npm i"
scripts.start: concurrently -n IntelCompile,IntelRun,Payload,Prettier "cd Intel && npm run watch-ts && npm run watch-prettier" "cd Intel && npm run watch-node && npm run watch-prettier" "cd Payload && npm start && npm run prettier-watch"
scripts.build: concurrently -n Intel,Payload"cd Intel && npm run build" "cd Payload && npm run build"
